answers.answer: indigestion with gas I have this issue alot i have actually got use to it I believe it is gas trapped in the body that is affecting you have had all the test nothing major change how you eat for a week and then check it out

Have you been checked for low or high blood pressure?  Some people have a condition where their blood pressure changes when they are in different positions such as standing, sitting, and laying down.  You should probably have your doctor check your blood pressure during these positions in the office.

question: comes and goes feel off in the morning like i cant quite shake the cobwebs. I eat i feel this rush over me that makes me feel almost a slight amount of pressure in my head. I get flush to the point where my head and ears are visibly red. I get some confusion and loss of concentration. after minimum of an hour I get real tired. this happens several times a day and always gets worse when i eat. usually when this is going on it will stay with me for several weeks some times longer than a month. As quickly as it starts I stop having the issues, for the most part. As time goes on the periods where I have these issues lasts longer and the period where I do not have the issues grows shorter. Some times as little as a week or two. I have had a CT scan, MRI, Sleep Dep test, been tested for epilepsy, many blood tests, and no answers. Been diagnosed with migraines but meds didn’t help they decided that was incorrect (Never get head aches with this) Diabetes, thyroid, ruled out. what is wrong?
title: what is wrong with me
